txt.en: You have safely escorted the wayward bull to Ilmo
Ilmo was grateful for your assistance against the peikko, but troubles seem ever ready to assail him.

'The most cherished bull of my herd has been missing for some time. I fear the peikko have taken him, but I cannot be sure. He is a powerful fighter and oft would put up a great call when the peikko attacked, but his call has been silent for a long while.

'I saw him grazing last to the north, past the hirvi-herd among the hills. If you would go there, perhaps you will find some sign of his passing.

'Find the hirvi-bull, even just word of him, and your reward will be great!'
The wayward bull may be nearby, among the mountains north of Sûri-kylä and Ilmo's camp.\n\nIlmo fears that his prize bull has been taken by the peikko and has asked you to search for him.
'You have returned my bull to me unharmed! I owe you much. I will spread the word of your good deeds throughout the camps of the Lossoth. You are truly a [placeholder] of great character.'
Ilmo is outside of Sûri-kylä, north from its gates.\n\nYou should return to Ilmo and let him know that his bull has been returned safely.
'Have you found my bull? I do hope that he has simply become lost and has not fallen to the storms...or worse. He was last seen wandering north of here, near to the hills north of Sûri-kylä.'
The bull looks like he is willing to follow you.
Escort the wayward bull to safety
